name: SEARCH ALL - STEAMPUNK
description:
SEARCH ALL - STEAMPUNK

is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the bolts and screws on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location depicts a steampunk-style town. In the foreground of the location there are unusual houses, such as crab houses, a mill house and a house of unknown purpose. In the middle of the city, along its entire length, there is a stone bridge for transport, cars and carts move along it. In the sky, a cyber owl sits on steam pipes, blinking constantly. There are also several "Heavenly towns" in the sky.

Key features:
- Animation elements on location;
- "Doodling" design style;
- 80 bolts/screws to be found;
- Pleasant soundtrack:
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result.
